room_title: Escape room "Submerged" by The One 2 Escape Room in Miami
room_description:
The Bermuda triangle is also known as the “Devil’s Triangle”. It is located in the Atlantic Ocean. A large number of aircrafts and ships have simply disappeared under very mysterious circumstances.

You are a group of scientists tasked with researching this mysterious location. During your voyage, you have encountered many odd phenomenons and have been keeping a scientific log.

On day 56 of your voyage, you and your team all mysteriously pass out. When you awake you have no idea where you are, who you are, or why you were there. Be the one to escape Submerged.
